channel.title: elephant camp on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in elephant camp on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: With elephants @ Dubare
item.description: This year we didn’t celebrate Aarush B’day as we moved to our own apartment. Being new to complex we hardly knew anyone to invite.So decided to celebrate his B’day at school which he of-course didn’t like much as he didn’t receive any gifts and top of it he has to give return gifts to his school mates….which he did so with heavy heart. We decided to take him to Dubare elephant camp.
